item.dc:creator: BladesTR
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

For Content Update 2, the way the subtitles and in game voice lines work has been completely restructured and rewritten. Even if your old files worked, they would shortly become redundant anyway. The new format has many large advantages and is much easier to work with. I would suggest waiting until Content Update 2 is deployed in December, before you start thinking about making your own translations/using translations for other languages. We’ve basically told the translations teams to wait, for this reason.

So how can I solve the problem? Can you help?
